name: R.R. ROOTS RACE
description:
We are Gaming Development Students from Curitiba, Brazil, and this game was made in 48 hours for the  2023 Global Game Jam's Edition.
WE ARE PROUD of this game and we will defend it (unless you have a nice critique to do, so you can enjoy the commentary section to let us know about your feelings of our game).
Thanks for playing.
